title: Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: O.T.", 1930–45
medium: Pen and black, blue, yellow, green and red ink; brush and black ink, blue, yellow, green and red watercolor; graphite on cream illustration board.
inscribed: In graphite at lower right corner:"O.T.": at upper right corner:"824"
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Monogram comprised of a "T" in solid black and black lines drawn in perspective, four "O"s, each of a different color, drawn in perspective and threaded through the horizontal element of the "T".

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: O.T.", 1930–45.
1930–45. Pen and black, blue, yellow, green and red ink; brush and black ink, blue, yellow, green and red watercolor; graphite on cream illustration board.. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-102.
